summary: AN ORDINANCE related to King County Regional Vote By Mail Initiative; authorizing an agreement to establish MAIL BALLOT DROP OFF LOCATIONS at six of the City's Department of Neighborhoods "payment center" facilities located at (Ballard) 5604 22nd Ave NW, (Central) 2301 S. Jackson St. Suite 208, (Delridge) 5405 Delridge Way SW, (Lake City) 12525 28th Ave NE, (Southeast) 3815 S. Othello St. Suite 105, and (University) 4534 University Way NE; and increasing appropriations to the Department of Neighborhoods in the 2008 Budget, all by a three- fourths vote of the City Council.
